raw_input: I'm not sure where to start — my team can't agree on what we're building
refined_task: Create a structured Convergence Brief and stakeholder alignment framework for a team experiencing conflicting definitions of project scope and success. Deliverables should include: (1) a Convergence Brief template (RIU-001) capturing written stakeholder commitments across five dimensions — Goal, Roles, Constraints, Capabilities, and Non-goals — with guidance on how to facilitate agreement on each;
